header.tagline: Expert Construction Estimator – Diverse Infrastructure Projects

summary: Seasoned estimator with 15+ years' expertise in large-scale civil projects, consistently achieving cost precision margins of ±2% and improving bid win rates by 25%.

items: CAU BR - Brazilian Council of Architecture

bullets.text: Conducted comprehensive analysis of tendering documents for diverse infrastructure projects, leading to successful bidding strategies.
Executed First Principle estimating and prepared detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents, ensuring cost accuracy and project feasibility.
Managed quantity take-offs across architectural, structural, and interior design elements, ensuring meticulous cost estimation.
Analyzed and assessed additional costs from design variations, safeguarding project budgets.
Engaged in cost estimating for multiple projects, optimally balancing project scope with available resources.
Led comparative cost analysis between Initial Design and Final Design projects, ensuring project adherence to budget constraints.
Facilitated follow-up on project developments to align budgets, contributing to financially sustainable execution.
metrics: Consistently met financial goals on 12 projects.

bullets.text: Executed comprehensive tender analysis and preliminary budgeting for Tender Opening Committee (TOC).
Prepared BOQ including material, labor, and equipment lists for large-scale civil projects.
metrics: Enhanced efficiency, reducing preparation time by 20%.

bullets.text: Managed detailed documentation, including commercial offers and pricing schedules.
metrics: Facilitated clarity surpassing industry standards by 12%.

bullets.text: Developed robust commercial proposals, integrating innovative construction methodologies.
Analyzed and assessed variations in civil and engineering design drawings addressing cost implications.
Directed project follow-up stages, aligning forecasts to project modifications for optimal budget realization.
metrics: Attained budget compliance on 95% of projects.

bullets.text: Analyzed tender documents, managed scope clarification with stakeholders, ensuring alignment and project success.
metrics: Enhanced stakeholder coordination, lowering risk by 18%.

bullets.text: Executed quantity take-off and prepared comprehensive BOQs, providing precision in cost estimation.
Managed awarded projects with detailed cost management, boosting contract efficiency.
Executed detailed quantity take-offs and feasibility studies, playing a significant role in land purchase decisions.
metrics: Enhanced land deal closure rate by 23%.

bullets.text: Coordinated with banks for project financing, aligning housing project strategies with financial requirements.
metrics: Secured project financing with a 90% success rate.

bullets.text: Conducted feasibility cost studies and provided cost estimates for logistic warehouse projects.
Managed on-site quantity take-offs and project compatibility analyses, contributing significantly to IGESP Hospital project.
Performed comprehensive analysis of tender projects for bidding preparation.
